EmailTemplate.name: 2021BK – 04 & 05.2021BK-04 & 05
EmailTemplate.subject: 2021 BendixKing Sales Bulletin Updates and Discounts
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
Sales Bulletin | October 2020
New Sales Bulletins
Honeywell is pleased to announce the following bulletins:
- 2021-BK04 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021BK-04 MST 70B Dealer Sales Bulletin.pdf]]> MST 70B Dealer Sales Bulletin - 2021-BK05 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021BK-05-RDR-2060-Weather-Radar-Upgrade-Program-Dealer-Bulletin.pdf]]> RDR 2060 Weather Radar Upgrade Program Dealer Bulletin
Dealers can find these bulletins on our website <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/NjQxLVFJWC05MTIAAAF7wTeSc1-OKdG-j-nP1VCQZz8Oar79FF_dzjRwaRfXS3jRHnWGARevXWxb9cWJeO8H2RPYee4=]]> under Purchase/Orders/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
